analysis.summary: GiftSection.vue defines a landing-page section that promotes a gift certificate. It renders a headline, descriptive text and a "Buy now" button linked to a specific product route, with a styled background image.
analysis.purpose: Serve as a reusable Vue component for the landing page, highlighting the gift certificate offer and navigating users to the purchase flow.

components.name: GiftSection
components.role: The main Vue component that encapsulates the template, script setup and styling for the gift certificate section.

components.name: router-link
components.role: Vue Router component used to navigate internally to the product details page when the button is clicked.

components.name: button
components.role: Standard HTML button styled via SCSS to trigger the router-link navigation.

functions.name: useRoute
functions.description: Provides reactive access to the current route object; imported but not actively used in current implementation.

functions.name: useRouter
functions.description: Gives programmatic navigation capabilities; imported and assigned to a constant, but not used further in the code.

functions.description: Factory for creating computed properties; imported but not utilized in this component.

functions.description: Lifecycle hook that runs after component mount; imported but not used.

functions.name: toRefs

analysis.usage: Imported and registered (either globally or locally) in the landing page parent component. Rendered via <GiftSection/> to display the gift certification call-to-action on the site’s landing route.
notes: The component uses <script setup> but currently does not leverage the imported Composition API functions—cleanup or future enhancements may be needed.
SCSS employs nested selectors for theming and background image styling under #gift → .section-1-col.
Router-link targets a hard-coded product UUID; consider parameterizing or sourcing dynamically for flexibility.
Button hover style inverts background and text color, matching the brand accent color #00ff88.
